TopicTitle: Rocketry and Orbital Spreadsheets for Excel

Articles.Content:
Hello all!

I created an Excel spreadsheet for rocketry which includes calculations for delta-v, TWR, load capacity, and burn time.

Then I created another spreadsheet for orbital statistics and conducting hohmann transfers which includes calculations for velocity at any point in an orbit, inclination change costs, and hohmann transfer instructions.

You can grab it here.

Use it by putting data in the input cells. It won't work unless you download it.

Edited July 27, 2014 by jandcando
Can you make a version that works with Open Office's spreadsheet capability?
